rules_text:
Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+0.
{3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put X 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: [i]“Typically they just become rust buckets, doomed to corrode into the soil. My job is to prevent that from happening.”[/i]
